name: Octopus Dive
description:
My very first Jam!

I didn't have much time to work on a very deep gameplay, so I guess this game is more about the atmosphere.

It includes a wonderful soundtrack made by my amazing friend.

Any suggestion to improve the concept is greatly appreciated.

Your objective is to reach the bottom of the ocean to lay your eggs.

You will need to eat small fish and avoid bigger predators to survive on the way down there.
